𒇴 ≈ 𒌋𒅖 ≈ 𒌋𒑙𒁹𒁹 ⚠️ ( 𒌋 as tenu marker )
𒇵 ≈ 𒌋𒑙𒁹𒆳𒁹
𒅖 ≈ 𒑙𒁹𒁹
𒇴 LAM ≠ 𒃸 GAN !
𒉈 LAM2
𒆗 LAMMA

LAM | 𒇴 | "to flourish; to make grow luxuriantly" Akk. ešēbu; uššubu Schöpfling
LUM | 𒈝 | ⇔ Elam 𒁹𒄬𒆷 𒁶 𒋾 haltamti 𒉏𒆠 elam 𒉏𒈠𒆠 elamtu עֵילָם ʿēlām

𒐼𒇴𒋫 sa3-lam-ta salvat slavat "slave"

𒇴×𒆳 LAM×mont ⋍ almond 𒇵
𒇴×𒆳 LAM×KUR = 𒇵, 𒇵 + RU = 𒇶 ARATTA
𒇴 ešēbu × KUR ⋍ 𒇵 šiqdum “almond” !

𒄿 𒇴 𒈠 𒁺
i-lam-ma-du
erlearmed
erlernt
lamád למד

𒇴 ešēbu; uššubu ⇔ 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓄿 𓀜 “teaching, learning” ⲥⲁⲃⲟ ⲥⲃⲱ ‘learn’ sophie ⇔ 𓋴 𓂋 𓐍 𓏜
𒇴 ešēbu ⋍ sapling ⇔ Schöpfling

𒄑𒇴 LAM Akk. lammu "sapling; a tree" Akk. lammu
𒄑𒇴 LAM Akk. lammu "a nut-bearing tree" Akk. lūku; šiqdu (almond)

𒀀𒇴 a-lam "a type of exclamation" ⇔
𒀀𒆷𒆷 a-la-la 𒂊𒆷𒇻 e-la-lu "soothing expression"

𒇴 LAM in 𒄠𒋛 el'mansur 𓍋 𓃀 𓅱 𓃰
